an5.108:1.1: “Mendicants, a mendicant with five qualities is worthy of offerings dedicated to the gods, worthy of hospitality, worthy of a religious donation, worthy of veneration with joined palms, and is the supreme field of merit for the world.
an5.108:2.2: It’s when they have the entire spectrum of the master’s ethics, immersion, wisdom, freedom, and knowledge and vision of freedom.
an5.108:2.3: A mendicant with these five qualities … is the supreme field of merit for the world.”
